biolockj.module.classifier

Class ClassifierModuleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.classifier.ClassifierModuleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ClassifierModule, ScriptModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kraken2Classifier, KrakenClassifier, MetaphlanClassifier, QiimeClassifier, RdpClassifier, SlimmClassifier

    public abstract class ClassifierModuleImpl
extends ScriptModuleImpl
implements ClassifierModule
    This is the superclass for all WGS and 16S biolockj.module.classifier BioModules.

    • Method Detail

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Validate module dependencies:
        • Call getClassifierExe() to verify the executable
        • Call getClassifierParams() to verify the runtime parameters are valid
        • Call validateModuleOrder() to validate module configuration order.
        • Call BioModule.checkDependencies() to validate script dependencies.
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        checkDependencies in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • getClassifierExe

        public String getClassifierExe()
                        throws Exception
        Get the classifier executable command from the Config. Verify command is either loaded as a cluster module or is a valid file path. To simplify the Config, default values for exe.classifier can be defined by replacing "exe" with a classifier type (rdp, qiime, kraken, metaphlan, or slimm). For example, if exe.classifer is missing or blank and getClassifierType() returns "rdp" the property rdp.classifier will be used in place of exe.classifier. This allows all classifiers to be defined in a file such as standard.properties.
        Specified by:
        getClassifierExe in interface ClassifierModule
        Returns:
        Classifier command to use in bash scripts
        Throws:
        Exception - if the executable is undefined or invalid

      • getClassifierParams

        public String getClassifierParams()
                           throws Exception
        Get optional classifier switches by appending "--" to each value in the list parameter if defined in the Config file. Classifiers that use a single "-" must be override this method. To simplify the Config, default values for exe.classifier can be defined by replacing "exe" with a classifier type (rdp, qiime, kraken, metaphlan, or slimm). For example, if exe.classifer is missing or blank and getClassifierType() returns "rdp" the property rdp.classifier will be used in place of exe.classifier. This allows all classifiers to be defined in a file such as standard.properties.
        Specified by:
        getClassifierParams in interface ClassifierModule
        Returns:
        String containing formatted switches to append to the executable
        Throws:
        Exception - if defined but invalid

      • getPostRequisiteModules

        public List<Class<?>> getPostRequisiteModules()
                                       throws Exception
        This method returns the corresponding Parser module associated with the classifier. The Parser module name is built using the same prefix used in the Classifier module

        For example RdpClassifier, will return the RdpParser.

        Specified by:
        getPostRequisiteModules in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        getPostRequisiteModules in class BioModuleImpl
        Returns:
        List of BioModules
        Throws:
        Exception - if invalid Class names are returned as post-requisites

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
                  throws Exception
        This method extends the basic summary by adding metrics on the input files. Prints the number and type of sequence files and the mean output file size.
        Specified by:
        getSummary in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        getSummary in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Returns:
        Summary of BioModule execution
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs

      • getClassifierType

        protected String getClassifierType()
        This method returns the classifier class name in lower case, after "classifier" is removed.
        The remaining text should uniquely identify the name of the program.
        The basic deployment will return one of: (rdp, qiime, kraken, metaphlan, or slimm).

        The purpose of this method is to allow users to configure multiple classifiers in a default properties file.
        Instead of setting the property "exe.classifier" in the Config file, leave this value blank and configure the default properties file one time with: "rdp.classifier", "qiime.classifier", "kraken.classifier", "metaphlan.classifier", and "slimm.classifier".
        The same approach should be taken with "exe.classifierParams".

        Returns:
        String rdp, qiime, kraken, metaphlan, slimm

      • validateModuleOrder

        protected void validateModuleOrder()
                            throws Exception
        Validate biolockj.module.classifier modules run after biolockj.module.seq modules.
        Throws:
        Exception - if modules are out of order

      • getNumThreads

        public static Integer getNumThreads()
                             throws ConfigFormatException,
                                    ConfigNotFoundException
        Get classifier specific number of threads property value, if defined. Otherwise, return the standard number of threads property value.
        Returns:
        Positive integer value
        Throws:
        ConfigFormatException - if property is not a positive integer
        ConfigNotFoundException - if properties are undefined

      • getNumThreadsParam

        public static String getNumThreadsParam()
                                 throws ConfigFormatException
        Get classifier number of threads property name.
        Returns:
        Number of threads property name
        Throws:
        ConfigFormatException - if property is not a positive integer
